title: Lego (+ Rokenbok) Design Competition
description: Me and a close friend entered a lego design contest where we built a city scape out of lego and rokenbok pieces. It had a Rockenblock monorail!

title: My First Invention: The Butter-Sauna
description: During covid I enrolled in Mark Rober's invention curriculum where I created a machine that softens butter to room temperature in 4% of the time it normally takes for making cookies.

title: FTC 20099 2021 Robot - Robot Of Unusual Size (R.O.U.S.)
description: ROUS represented Team Inconcievable's FTC team's Rookie year. It ended up placing second in the state championship and being alliance captain #2.

title: FRC 2022 Robot - Miracle Max
description: Miracle Max marked Team 1729's recovery year, bringing valuable lessons and challenges that we overcame together. Through persistence and determination, we achieved our first-ever qualifying competition win—a milestone that demonstrated our team's resilience and growth.

title: Halloween Haunted Walk 2022
description: I designed and built a haunted walk in my backyard for the first year. It was fairly bare-bones so I only have this video compilation of the event. Also pay no attention to the script, it was written by ai and my 12 year old self thought it was amazing.

title: Lilith Studios Halloween Youtube Channel
description: I created and managed a youtube channel dedicated to the Haunted houses and Halloween walks, along with animatronic unboxing and short films

title: FRC 2023 Robot - Sylvester
description: Sylvester is Team 1729’s versatile 2023 robot, built for precise cone and cube handling, stable scoring at multiple levels, and dependable autonomous paths that strengthened overall match consistency.

title: Alien Sci-Fi Horror Trailer
description: During a video production camp at ID tech, I filmed and edited a sci-fi horror moovie trailer over the course of a week. Disclaimer: I could not find the film on any of my hardrives or backups.

title: Vex Battlebot at ID tech Camp
description: I designed the champion battle bot for a Vex Battlebot competition at ID tech camp.

title: Pretty Ugly Sound Designs Music Youtube Channel
description: I made music during covid and created a youtube channel to post them on.

title: Halloween Haunted House 2023
description: For the Second year in a row, I designed and built a haunted house for my local community. This year I added animatronics, lighting effects, and sound design to enhance the experience.

title: Jacob the Drone Guy Youtube Channel
description: I created a Youtube channel for displaying Videos I made with my drone and camera.

title: 1729 2024 Robot Reveal Video
description: I filmed a Robot Reveal video for my FRC team 1729's 2024 competition robot, showcasing the design and features of our robot for the 2024 FRC season.

title: 1729 3D Printed Pins
description: As a CAD Project, I designed and 3D printed custom pins for our FRC team 1729. These pins were given out at events

title: 1729 2024 Pit Design
description: I designed and built my frc team's award wining pit display out of PVC pipes, lasercut gears, plastic sheets, screens, a projector, and LEDs.

title: FRC New England District Championship 2024
description: We won our division at the New England District Championship and qualified for the FRC World Championship in Houston, Texas! Shoutout to our alliance partners 131 and 6329 for being amazing!

title: FRC World Championship 2024 - Houston Texas
description: We made it to worlds! Our FRC team 1729 Inconceivable qualified for the FRC World Championship in Houston Texas after a successful season and winning our division in the New England district championship. We were an alliance captain and were placed at number one in our division for a while!

title: FRC 2024 Robot - Rev (The Revenge)
description: REV is Team 1729’s high-speed 2024 robot, designed for consistent scoring, dependable intake performance, and smooth autonomous routines that maximized efficiency and reliability in every match.

title: SJRS Craft Fair 2024
description: I sold Honey, 3D Dragons, Lasercut things, and other nicknacks at my school's craft fair.

title: 3D Printed Multicolor Dragon Business
description: I started a small business selling 3d printed multicolor dragons on Etsy, I printed, packaged, and shipped them from home.

title: Power Saw Stand for the NMH Makerspace
description: I designed a power saw stand for my school's makerspace made out of 2*4s and plywood with two expanable sides for cutting longer pieces of wood.

title: Halloween Haunted House 2024
description: For the Third year in a row, I designed and built a haunted house for my local community. This year I added animatronics, lighting effects, and sound design to enhance the experience.

title: NMH 2024 Fall Play - Tech Crew
description: I was on the Tech Crew for my school's fall play, '12th Night'. I helped with light fictures and set construction

title: NMH 2024 Fall Dance Show Lighting Design
description: I designed the lights for two of the dances in my schools fall dance show. Shoutout to Bonnie and Niayla for being amazing choreographers!

title: Honey + Dragons at the Chesterfield Farmers Market
description: I sold my 3d printed dragons and homemade honey at my local farmers market

title: HUM 1 English Final Movie
description: As my final for my Hum 1 English class, me and a friend created a short film based off of the book 'Speak' by Laurie Halse Anderson.

title: 2025 Driverstation Design
description: I designed a custom driverstation for my FRC team to use during competitiions built out of Polycarb, 80/20 extrusions, and 3D prints.

title: FRC 1729 2025 Competition Robot - Ellie
description: I helped design and build my local FRC team's 2025 competition robot, Ellie. I was also operating the robot on driveteam throughout the season. Ellie made it to the 2025 district championship!

title: NMH One-Act Festival
description: I designed the set and lights for a One-Act play at my school. Shoutout to Henry for being an amazing director!

title: FPV Drone Build
description: I built my first FPV racing drone from scratch, learning about electronics, soldering, and control systems along the way.

title: Wyatt Haunt Website
description: I designed and developed the website for my haunted house, Wyatt Haunt. This year was themed as 'Forest of Fears.'

title: Halloween Haunted House 2025 - Forest of Fears
description: For the third year in a row, I designed and built a haunted house for my neighborhood. This year it expanded to include new animatronics and a full storyline.

title: FTC Design Project
description: This year I decided to take a stab at designing an FTC robot. This is my first attempt at designing an FTC robot from scratch and I never completed the project

title: Offseason FRC Design Projects
description: All of the cad design work I did during the offseason including drivetrains, mastersketches, intakes, and shooters.

title: Fall Dance Show Lighting Design
description: I designed the lights for one of the dances in my schools fall dance show. Shoutout to Bonnie for being an amazing choreographer!

title: Urinetown | Set Design + Audio Engineering
description: I helped design and build the set for my school's production of Urinetown, as well as managing the audio engineering during performances.

title: 1729 Team Inconcievable Website
description: I designed and developed the website for FRC Team 1729 Inconceivable, showcasing our team’s achievements, projects, and values.
